availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Clifton Penn Baker, Sr. (Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Alice Baker. Father of William Baker, Samuel Bakers, Sarah J. Baker, George C. P. Baker, Jr., Joseph T. Baker, Mary T. Baker, Thomas B. T. Baker, and James Baker. Farmer in Hancock County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 276; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 45; Find A Grave, "George Clifton Penn Baker (1811-1887)," Memorial #86712041, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=86712041 (accessed April 14, 2017).
